update ent_module set sys_name = #{sysName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_user = #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_user = #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, company_code = #{companyCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sys_module_code = #{sysModuleCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sequence = #{sequence,jdbcType=INTEGER} where sys_code = #{sysCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
update ent_module set status = 0 where company_code = #{companyCode}
mapper.select: SELECT from ent_module where company_code = #{companyCode} and status = 1
select t.sys_code sysCode, t.company_code companyCode from ent_module t where t.sys_module_code = #{sysModuleCode} and t.status=1
